Gandhi warned of exposing this alleged misconduct, deeming it treasonous and promising accountability for those involved. ]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/wont-spare-anyone-rahul-gandhi-accuses-ec-of-vote-chori-for-bjp-claims-to-have-open-and-shut-proof/articleshow/123038294.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/wont-spare-anyone-rahul-gandhi-accuses-ec-of-vote-chori-for-bjp-claims-to-have-open-and-shut-proof/articleshow/123038294.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 13:21:06 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="735355" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123038294,imgsize-735355.cms"/></item><item><title>24 houses, multiple vehicles: Lokayukta raids home of ex-clerk earning Rs 15k</title><description><![CDATA[A former clerk in Koppal, earning a modest salary, is under investigation for amassing approximately Rs 30 crore in assets through alleged corruption within KRIDL. Lokayukta officials raided his residence, uncovering numerous properties and implicating him in a Rs 72 crore misappropriation scheme involving fabricated project documents. Investigations are ongoing, with promises of action against all involved parties.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/hubballi/kridl-scam-ex-clerk-with-rs-15000-salary-amassed-assets-worth-rs-30cr/articleshow/123026648.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/hubballi/kridl-scam-ex-clerk-with-rs-15000-salary-amassed-assets-worth-rs-30cr/articleshow/123026648.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 10:43:48 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="69930" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123035144,imgsize-69930.cms"/></item><item><title>How China's DeepSeek made Mark Zuckerberg lose faith in Meta's AI team</title><description><![CDATA[Mark Zuckerberg is under pressure to justify Meta's massive AI investments as the company's profit growth slows. Following the disappointing performance of Llama 4, Zuckerberg initiated a secretive "Superintelligence lab," poaching top AI talent with lucrative offers. Investors are cautiously optimistic, but concerns remain about the escalating costs and the shift away from open-source AI.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/how-chinas-deepseek-may-have-made-mark-zuckerberg-lose-faith-in-metas-ai-team-and-start-the-biggest-ever-talent-war-in-silicon-valley/articleshow/122996018.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/how-chinas-deepseek-may-have-made-mark-zuckerberg-lose-faith-in-metas-ai-team-and-start-the-biggest-ever-talent-war-in-silicon-valley/articleshow/122996018.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 16:27:57 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="23578" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122995948,imgsize-23578.cms"/></item><item><title>'Not the case': Tharoor on Trump's 'dead economy' jab; counters Rahul again</title><description><![CDATA[Shashi Tharoor contradicted Rahul Gandhi's agreement with Donald Trump's assessment of the Indian economy. While Rahul Gandhi claimed PM Modi had "killed" the economy, Tharoor stated that this was not the case. Trump had suggested India and Russia could "take their dead economies down together," a statement Rahul Gandhi supported.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/not-the-case-shashi-tharoor-asked-about-trumps-dead-economy-remark-counters-rahuls-stance-once-more/articleshow/123038451.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/not-the-case-shashi-tharoor-asked-about-trumps-dead-economy-remark-counters-rahuls-stance-once-more/articleshow/123038451.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 13:27:37 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="885424" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123038482,imgsize-885424.cms"/></item><item><title>Who will succeed Dhankhar? VP election on September 9</title><description><![CDATA[The Election Commission of India has declared that the election for the Vice President of India is scheduled for September 9, 2025. As per the ECI's released schedule, the deadline for submitting nominations is August 21. The counting of votes will occur on the same day as the election, September 9.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/who-will-replace-jagdeep-dhankhar-vice-presidential-election-on-september-9-all-you-need-to-know/articleshow/123038111.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/who-will-replace-jagdeep-dhankhar-vice-presidential-election-on-september-9-all-you-need-to-know/articleshow/123038111.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 13:00:21 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="168812" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123038344,imgsize-168812.cms"/></item><item><title>'No support in male-dominated society': Divya becomes India’s 4th female GM; but why so few?</title><description><![CDATA[Divya Deshmukh's Grandmaster title highlights a gender disparity in Indian chess. Only four Indian women have achieved this rank, compared to over eighty men. Experts cite societal pressures, lack of support, and financial constraints as key factors. They emphasize the need for inclusive policies, coaching, and financial aid. This will encourage more women to pursue chess professionally.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/chess/chess-no-support-in-male-dominated-society-divya-deshmukh-becomes-indias-4th-female-gm-but-why-arent-there-more/articleshow/123035744.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/chess/chess-no-support-in-male-dominated-society-divya-deshmukh-becomes-indias-4th-female-gm-but-why-arent-there-more/articleshow/123035744.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 11:11:06 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>JYOTIRMOY HALDER</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="102740" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123035827,imgsize-102740.cms"/></item><item><title>How Amazon's 'AI mistake' is a basic lesson for every engineer using Gen-AI</title><description><![CDATA[An Amazon Gen-AI coding tool, Q Developer, faced a security breach where a hacker infiltrated it with malicious code disguised as a legitimate update. This allowed the hacker to instruct the tool to delete files from users' computers. The incident highlights vulnerabilities in AI-driven software development, as many organizations using AI for coding do so in risky ways.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/how-amazons-ai-mistake-is-a-basic-lesson-for-every-engineer-using-gen-ai-for-coding/articleshow/123028573.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/how-amazons-ai-mistake-is-a-basic-lesson-for-every-engineer-using-gen-ai-for-coding/articleshow/123028573.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 00:07:56 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="136524" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123028576,imgsize-136524.cms"/></item><item><title>Trump tariff impact? Oil refiners stop Russia oil purchases in spot market</title><description><![CDATA[Following US tariffs on Indian exports due to trade ties with Russia, state-owned refiners like IOCL, BPCL, HPCL, and MRPL have reportedly ceased spot market purchases of Russian crude oil. Reliance Industries and Nayara Energy, with term agreements, may continue imports. This shift could raise costs and impact refining margins, though India can transition to alternative sources.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/donald-trump-tariff-impact-state-run-oil-refiners-stop-russia-crude-oil-purchases-in-spot-market-government-says-no-instructions-given/articleshow/123037780.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/donald-trump-tariff-impact-state-run-oil-refiners-stop-russia-crude-oil-purchases-in-spot-market-government-says-no-instructions-given/articleshow/123037780.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 14:24:18 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="63864" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123039556,imgsize-63864.cms"/></item><item><title>‘Coerced to bury 100 bodies’: SIT finds 15 bones in Dharmasthala forest pit</title><description><![CDATA[A Special Investigation Team (SIT) in Dharmasthala unearthed partial skeletal remains, suspected to be of a man, from a sixth burial site identified by a complainant alleging mass burials. SC on defamation case against Tharoor over 'scorpion' remark on PM Modi</title><description><![CDATA[The Supreme Court considered closing the criminal defamation case against Shashi Tharoor over his "scorpion on a Shivling" remark about Narendra Modi. While Tharoor sought adjournment, the complainant wanted a hearing, but the bench suggested dismissing the case, emphasizing tolerance among political figures. The court eventually scheduled the matter for another day, maintaining a previous order that had suspended proceedings.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/why-be-touchy-sc-asks-to-close-defamation-case-against-shashi-tharoor-over-scorpion-remark-on-pm-modi-what-top-court-said/articleshow/123037465.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/why-be-touchy-sc-asks-to-close-defamation-case-against-shashi-tharoor-over-scorpion-remark-on-pm-modi-what-top-court-said/articleshow/123037465.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 12:44:21 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="41580" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123037766,imgsize-41580.cms"/></item><item><title>Not a single person has accepted the offer: Murati on her team rejecting Zuckerberg’s $1 bn offer</title><description><![CDATA[Meta's aggressive pursuit of AI talent faced a significant setback as Thinking Machines Lab, led by Mira Murati, reportedly rejected lucrative offers, some reaching a billion dollars, to join Meta's Superintelligence Lab. Restrictions on UPI Autopay during peak hours will also be implemented.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/upi-system-changes-new-npci-rules-kick-in-from-august-1-all-you-need-to-know/articleshow/123025161.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/upi-system-changes-new-npci-rules-kick-in-from-august-1-all-you-need-to-know/articleshow/123025161.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 21:59:34 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="561690" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123025195,imgsize-561690.cms"/></item><item><title>Kamala recounts painful experience of losing to Trump: Watch</title><description><![CDATA[Kamala Harris, in her first public appearance since losing the 2024 election, joined Stephen Colbert to discuss her new memoir, '107 Days.' He may also conduct football workshops.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/football/top-stories/lionel-messi-to-visit-india-in-december-and-visit-three-cities-complete-schedule/articleshow/123037220.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/football/top-stories/lionel-messi-to-visit-india-in-december-and-visit-three-cities-complete-schedule/articleshow/123037220.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 12:18:43 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GAURAV GUPTA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="31696" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123037348,imgsize-31696.cms"/></item><item><title>SSC exam glitches spark protest: Here’s why #SSCMisManagement is trending</title><description><![CDATA[Widespread disruptions during the SSC Selection Post Phase 13 exams have ignited nationwide protests. By day 15, 'Saiyaara's' total collection reached ₹280.73 crore.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/box-office/saiyaara-box-office-collection-day-15-live-the-ahaan-panday-aneet-padda-movie-slows-down-after-making-rs-100-crore-in-week-2-as-son-of-sardaar-2-and-dhadak-2-release/articleshow/123037000.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/box-office/saiyaara-box-office-collection-day-15-live-the-ahaan-panday-aneet-padda-movie-slows-down-after-making-rs-100-crore-in-week-2-as-son-of-sardaar-2-and-dhadak-2-release/articleshow/123037000.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 13:00:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI ENTERTAINMENT DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="34856" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123037217,imgsize-34856.cms"/></item><item><title>Trump tariffs: Most and least affected countries- does India make it to either list?</title><description><![CDATA[In a significant move, the US has unveiled revised global tariff rates, impacting numerous nations and the EU. President Trump's Executive Order imposes tariffs from 10% to over 41%, factoring in geopolitical risks and trade imbalances. Syria, Laos, and Myanmar face the highest levies, while the UK and Brazil receive preferential 10% rates.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/international-business/trump-tariffs-hit-dozens-of-countries-which-are-the-most-and-least-affected-check-if-india-makes-it-to-either-list/articleshow/123034197.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/international-business/trump-tariffs-hit-dozens-of-countries-which-are-the-most-and-least-affected-check-if-india-makes-it-to-either-list/articleshow/123034197.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 10:47:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1216647" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123034825,imgsize-1216647.cms"/></item><item><title>Watch: Andhra minister’s brother slaps cop at temple; arrested</title><description><![CDATA[During a temple inauguration in Andhra Pradesh's Nandyal district, BC Janardhan Reddy's brother, Madana Bhoopal Reddy, slapped a police constable on duty. The incident, captured on video, triggered public outrage and led to Bhoopal Reddy's arrest. Minister Janardhan Reddy condemned the act, assuring that those responsible would face legal consequences, emphasizing the government's intolerance for such behavior.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/vijayawada/ministers-brother-slaps-on-duty-cop-in-nandyal/articleshow/123026723.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/vijayawada/ministers-brother-slaps-on-duty-cop-in-nandyal/articleshow/123026723.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 23:01:55 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>SANDEEP RAGHAVAN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="805720" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123033824,imgsize-805720.cms"/></item><item><title>‘Get up or I’ll get you up’: Flight passenger slapped for refusing to give up seat</title><description><![CDATA[A shocking incident occurred at Bogota's El Dorado International Airport. Hector Santacruz slapped Claudia Segura for refusing to give up a seat. The incident led to a large brawl among travellers. Segura was injured and received medical attention. Santacruz was arrested by airport security. His wife apologized for his actions on social media. The incident has sparked outrage online.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/get-up-or-ill-get-you-up-flight-passenger-slapped-for-refusing-to-give-up-seat-bogota-airport-chaos/articleshow/123035473.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/get-up-or-ill-get-you-up-flight-passenger-slapped-for-refusing-to-give-up-seat-bogota-airport-chaos/articleshow/123035473.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 11:06:57 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="896652" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123035874,imgsize-896652.cms"/></item><item><title>Noida student expelled for poor attendance kidnaps minor girl</title><description><![CDATA[In Noida, Monu Yadav was arrested for kidnapping a class 12 student from outside her school. The girl was rescued. Yadav, a former student expelled for poor attendance, forcibly took the girl in his car. CCTV footage captured the incident. Police filed a case and formed teams to locate the accused and the girl.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/noida/class-xii-student-kidnapped-outside-school-in-noida-man-arrested/articleshow/123005049.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/noida/class-xii-student-kidnapped-outside-school-in-noida-man-arrested/articleshow/123005049.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 00:52:44 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>ADVITYA BAHL</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="23906" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123032961,imgsize-23906.cms"/></item><item><title>DU introduces pause-and-resume option; here's how NEP rule will work</title><description><![CDATA[Delhi University has introduced the Multiple Entry and Multiple Exit (ME-ME) scheme under NEP 2020, allowing undergraduate students to pause and resume their degrees after completing any even semester. Credits remain valid for up to seven years, enabling students to re-enter without academic loss. This flexible structure aims to support diverse student needs and reduce dropout rates.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/delhi-university-allows-students-to-pause-and-resume-ug-degrees-heres-how-the-new-nep-rule-works/articleshow/123011909.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/delhi-university-allows-students-to-pause-and-resume-ug-degrees-heres-how-the-new-nep-rule-works/articleshow/123011909.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 11:03:43 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>APEKSHA TANWAR</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="2049656" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123011927,imgsize-2049656.cms"/></item><item><title>Football: Khalid Jamil appointed India manager, first Indian in 13 years</title><description><![CDATA[Khalid Jamil has been named the head coach of the Indian national men's football team, marking the first time in 13 years an Indian has held the position. The AIFF executive committee chose the former India international from a shortlist, succeeding Manolo Marquez. Jamil's first challenge will be the CAFA Nations Cup in Tajikistan and Uzbekistan, starting August 29.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/football/top-stories/khalid-jamil-appointed-india-mens-football-team-manager-first-indian-in-13-years/articleshow/123038462.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/football/top-stories/khalid-jamil-appointed-india-mens-football-team-manager-first-indian-in-13-years/articleshow/123038462.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 13:11:43 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="37294" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123038446,imgsize-37294.cms"/></item><item><title>'Was asked to arrest Mohan Bhagwat': Ex-ATS cop recalls Malegaon blast probe</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/was-asked-to-arrest-rss-chief-mohan-bhagwat-ex-ats-cop-recalls-malegaon-blast-probe-alleges-pressure-to-push-saffron-terror-angle/articleshow/123035490.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/was-asked-to-arrest-rss-chief-mohan-bhagwat-ex-ats-cop-recalls-malegaon-blast-probe-alleges-pressure-to-push-saffron-terror-angle/articleshow/123035490.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 10:42:13 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1952597" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123035483,imgsize-1952597.cms"/></item><item><title>Trump outburst may help govt counter ‘surrender’ charge; Nair refrained from taking an extra run out of respect. Woakes' injury appears serious, potentially ending his series. Gus Atkinson expressed concern and readiness to step in. Woakes has had a challenging series, taking only 11 wickets.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-5th-test-karun-nair-earns-plaudits-for-sportsmanship-stops-for-injured-chris-woakes/articleshow/123034463.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-5th-test-karun-nair-earns-plaudits-for-sportsmanship-stops-for-injured-chris-woakes/articleshow/123034463.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 09:53:52 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="30560" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123034670,imgsize-30560.cms"/></item><item><title>Himachal rain fury: Landslide near Pandoh Dam shuts Mandi-Kullu Highway</title><description><![CDATA[Heavy rainfall continues to wreak havoc in Himachal Pradesh, triggering a landslide near Pandoh Dam that shut down the Mandi-Kullu section of the Chandigarh-Manali Highway. Hundreds of roads remain blocked, with Mandi district being the worst hit. Rising river levels prompted the opening of Kol Dam floodgates.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/shimla/himachal-pradesh-rain-fury-landslide-near-pandoh-dam-shuts-mandi-kullu-highway-mandi-worst-hit/articleshow/123034923.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/shimla/himachal-pradesh-rain-fury-landslide-near-pandoh-dam-shuts-mandi-kullu-highway-mandi-worst-hit/articleshow/123034923.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 10:39:15 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI CITY DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="86198" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123035457,imgsize-86198.cms"/></item><item><title>After denied debut in 5th Test, India pacer Arshdeep poses with family in London - see pic</title><description><![CDATA[India's team selection for the final Test against England at The Oval sparked debate, especially regarding Arshdeep Singh's continued absence despite regaining fitness. While Arshdeep remained patient, Kuldeep Yadav and Abhimanyu Easwaran also awaited their opportunities. Ultimately, India opted for a pace-heavy attack, reflecting the recent dominance of fast bowlers at The Oval, as they aimed to level the series.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-after-denied-test-debut-in-5th-test-india-pacer-arshdeep-singh-poses-with-family-in-london-see-pic/articleshow/123035329.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-after-denied-test-debut-in-5th-test-india-pacer-arshdeep-singh-poses-with-family-in-london-see-pic/articleshow/123035329.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 10:40:28 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="127296" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123035453,imgsize-127296.cms"/></item><item><title>‘Many laughed. Few believed’: Cong attacks govt over ED raids on Ambani</title><description><![CDATA[Congress has escalated its criticism of PM Modi, referencing Rahul Gandhi's 2018 allegations against Anil Ambani concerning a "Rs 1,30,000 crore surgical strike" on defense forces. This comes as the ED summoned Ambani for questioning in a Rs 17,000 crore loan fraud case, following raids on his properties.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/many-laughed-few-believed-congress-attacks-govt-over-ed-raids-on-anil-ambani-recalls-rahuls-old-charge/articleshow/123035824.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/many-laughed-few-believed-congress-attacks-govt-over-ed-raids-on-anil-ambani-recalls-rahuls-old-charge/articleshow/123035824.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 11:05:21 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="802480" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123035826,imgsize-802480.cms"/></item><item><title>Kidney health: How much water do you need to drink daily for healthy kidneys?</title><description><![CDATA[Water, essential for bodily functions and kidney health, requires nuanced intake based on individual factors like age, activity, and health conditions. Research links adequate hydration to reduced CKD risk, but overhydration can be harmful. Guidelines suggest 2.7-3.7 liters daily from all sources, with 1.5-2 liters of plain water recommended.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/health-fitness/health-news/kidney-health-how-much-water-do-you-need-to-drink-daily-for-healthy-kidneys/articleshow/123013940.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/health-fitness/health-news/kidney-health-how-much-water-do-you-need-to-drink-daily-for-healthy-kidneys/articleshow/123013940.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 19:30:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI LIFESTYLE DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="40356" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123013940,imgsize-40356.cms"/></item><item><title>In Delhi, you don’t have to smoke to get lung cancer</title><description><![CDATA[Delhi faces a lung cancer crisis fueled by hazardous air quality, as highlighted on Lung Cancer Day. The APAC Consensus reveals a surge in cases linked to pollution, impacting even non-smokers. Doctors report a concerning rise in lung cancer among younger, non-smoking individuals, attributing it to vehicular emissions, industrial pollutants, and other environmental factors.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/in-delhi-you-dont-have-to-smoke-to-get-lung-cancer/articleshow/123027767.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/in-delhi-you-dont-have-to-smoke-to-get-lung-cancer/articleshow/123027767.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 02:55:45 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>ANUJA JAISWAL</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1480424" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123033134,imgsize-1480424.cms"/></item><item><title>BSF jawan goes missing in Srinagar; search operations on</title><description><![CDATA[A Border Security Force jawan is missing. Sugam Choudhary is from the 60th Battalion. He was last seen at the battalion headquarters in Srinagar. Extensive searches are underway in nearby areas. Security forces have launched a large-scale operation. Police sources say there is no subversive angle. He may have left due to personal reasons. The investigation is ongoing.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/srinagar/bsf-jawan-goes-missing-in-srinagar-alert-sounded-search-operations-on/articleshow/123034544.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/srinagar/bsf-jawan-goes-missing-in-srinagar-alert-sounded-search-operations-on/articleshow/123034544.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 10:03:11 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>NASEER GANAI</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="50114" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123034551,imgsize-50114.cms"/></item><item><title>Gold price: Outlook for August 1; why 'sell on rise' strategy makes sense?</title><description><![CDATA[Gold price prediction today: Gold futures are facing pressure, struggling to recover, currently around ₹98,778. The trend remains vulnerable to declines until prices decisively break above the 21 EMA with strong volume.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/gold-price-prediction-today-what-is-the-gold-rate-outlook-for-august-01-2025-should-you-buy-or-sell-mcx-gold/articleshow/123035119.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/gold-price-prediction-today-what-is-the-gold-rate-outlook-for-august-01-2025-should-you-buy-or-sell-mcx-gold/articleshow/123035119.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 10:22:01 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="61996" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123035156,imgsize-61996.cms"/></item><item><title>'One peace deal per month': White House pushes for Nobel Prize for Trump</title><description><![CDATA[White House Press Secretary Karoline Leavitt asserted that President Trump brokered numerous peace deals, averaging one per month, and deserves the Nobel Peace Prize. Leavitt cited a ceasefire between Thailand and Cambodia, highlighting Trump's intervention and threat of halted trade negotiations. However, India has refuted Trump's claims of resolving conflicts with Pakistan, emphasizing bilateral resolutions.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/one-peace-deal-per-month-white-house-pushes-for-nobel-peace-prize-for-donald-trump-cites-india-pak-conflict/articleshow/123033251.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/one-peace-deal-per-month-white-house-pushes-for-nobel-peace-prize-for-donald-trump-cites-india-pak-conflict/articleshow/123033251.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 08:12:15 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1333110" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123033581,imgsize-1333110.cms"/></item><item><title>CAT 2025 registration begins: Check direct link to apply online here</title><description><![CDATA[The CAT 2025 registration window is now open at iimcat.ac.in from August 1 to September 13. Admit cards will be available from November 5, 2025.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/cat-2025-registrations-begins-at-iimcat-ac-in-check-direct-link-to-apply-online-here/articleshow/123034315.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/cat-2025-registrations-begins-at-iimcat-ac-in-check-direct-link-to-apply-online-here/articleshow/123034315.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 10:27:38 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>APEKSHA TANWAR</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1343753" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123035255,imgsize-1343753.cms"/></item><item><title>Heartfelt top 50 messages for your girlfriend on national girlfriend day</title><description><![CDATA[National Girlfriend's Day, celebrated on August 1st, honors the profound connections between women, emphasizing friendship and mutual support. It's a day to appreciate the women who uplift and stand by you, whether they are best friends or romantic partners. The celebration focuses on female connection, offering thoughtful messages to express gratitude and love for the women who enrich our lives.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/relationships/love-sex/happy-girlfriends-day-2025-heartfelt-top-50-wishes-quotes-images-greetings-gifs-whatsapp-statusmessages-for-your-girlfriend-on-national-girlfriend-day-to-make-her-feel-extra-special/articleshow/123033015.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/relationships/love-sex/happy-girlfriends-day-2025-heartfelt-top-50-wishes-quotes-images-greetings-gifs-whatsapp-statusmessages-for-your-girlfriend-on-national-girlfriend-day-to-make-her-feel-extra-special/articleshow/123033015.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 08:43:29 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI LIFESTYLE DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="133354" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123033166,imgsize-133354.cms"/></item><item><title>Yuzvendra Chahal DENIES romantic relationship with RJ Mahavash</title><description><![CDATA[Yuzvendra Chahal has finally addressed his divorce from Dhanashree Verma and the rumors linking him to RJ Mahavash. The couple agreed to keep their issues private on social media.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/news/yuzvendra-chahal-recalls-last-conversation-with-ex-wife-dhanashree-verma-reveals-truth-behind-be-your-own-sugar-daddy-t-shirt-wanted-to-give-a-message/articleshow/123034387.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/news/yuzvendra-chahal-recalls-last-conversation-with-ex-wife-dhanashree-verma-reveals-truth-behind-be-your-own-sugar-daddy-t-shirt-wanted-to-give-a-message/articleshow/123034387.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 09:29:16 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI ENTERTAINMENT DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="48376" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123034373,imgsize-48376.cms"/></item><item><title>US visa logjam: Indian students stuck in the waiting room; will Marco Rubio open the door?</title><description><![CDATA[A bureaucratic visa bottleneck has left thousands of Indian students stranded ahead of the Fall 2025 semester, as U.S. consulates in India slash appointment slots amid new digital vetting rules. Despite bipartisan pressure on Secretary of State Marco Rubio to restore processing, the crisis threatens U.S.–India educational ties, economic contributions, and America's global image as a welcoming academic destination.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/study-abroad/indian-students-trapped-in-the-waiting-room-of-their-american-dreams-will-marco-rubio-unlock-the-door/articleshow/123032740.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/study-abroad/indian-students-trapped-in-the-waiting-room-of-their-american-dreams-will-marco-rubio-unlock-the-door/articleshow/123032740.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 07:26:48 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>SASWATI SARKAR</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1768431" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123032794,imgsize-1768431.cms"/></item><item><title>Rummy row: Maharashtra minister loses agri portfolio, gets sports, minority affairs</title><description><![CDATA[Following a rummy controversy, NCP leader Ajit Pawar reassigned Agriculture Minister Manikrao Kokate to Sports and Youth Welfare, Minority Development, and Waqf. Dattatray Bharne will now head the agriculture department. This demotion followed Kokate's apology for the incident and assurances of improved behavior.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/mumbai/rummy-row-maharashtra-mantri-loses-agri-portfolio-gets-sports-minority-departments/articleshow/123029982.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/mumbai/rummy-row-maharashtra-mantri-loses-agri-portfolio-gets-sports-minority-departments/articleshow/123029982.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 03:11:13 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>CHAITANYA MARPAKWAR</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="133237" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123029982,imgsize-133237.cms"/></item><item><title>IND vs ENG: Gavaskar slams poor Jaiswal - 'There’s a bit of uncertainty'</title><description><![CDATA[Sunil Gavaskar has voiced concerns about Yashasvi Jaiswal's batting technique after his recent dismissal in the fifth Test. Gavaskar highlighted flaws in Jaiswal's footwork and shoulder positioning, impacting his ability to handle inswinging deliveries. India's top order struggled, leaving them at 204 for 6, needing a lower-order fightback to post a competitive total.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-sunil-gavaskar-slams-poor-yashasvi-jaiswal-theres-a-bit-of-uncertainty/articleshow/123034476.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-sunil-gavaskar-slams-poor-yashasvi-jaiswal-theres-a-bit-of-uncertainty/articleshow/123034476.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 09:41:03 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="49596" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123034502,imgsize-49596.cms"/></item></channel></rss>

      <description><![CDATA[The Genius Act marks a turning point for stablecoins, offering them legal legitimacy and regulatory clarity. “This legitimisation of stablecoins is certainly going to give a huge boost,” says Eswar Prasad, Professor at Cornell University.       <title><![CDATA[No interim US-India trade deal yet; Indian exporters brace for 20-25% tariffs as August 1 deadline nears]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/world/india-us-trade-deal-delay-trump-tariffs-impact-exporters-19644819.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Indian exporters are gearing up for possible US tariffs of 20–25% as the August 1 deadline set by President Trump approaches without an interim trade deal. While the tariff uncertainty has stalled orders, industry leaders say Indian exporters remain competitively placed compared to rivals like Bangladesh and China. Exporters expect the tariffs to impact profit margins more than supply chains, with fresh orders likely once clarity emerges post-deadline. Trade talks are set to resume in August as both countries work toward a broader agreement.]]></description>

      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/business/finance/epfo-disposed-of-over-98-pc-applications-for-pension-on-higher-wages-centre-19642728.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[The Supreme Court had upheld the Employees’ Pension (Amendment) Scheme 2014, which raised the pensionable salary cap to ₹15,000 per month from the earlier ₹6,500 and allowed employees and employers to contribute 8.33% of actual salaries if they exceeded the cap.]]></description>

      <description><![CDATA[PayPal has announced a new platform called ‘PayPal World’ to link several major payment systems and digital wallets. The initial partners include Mercado Pago, NPCI International Payments Limited (which operates UPI), PayPal, Tenpay Global, and Venmo. Together, they cover an estimated two billion users worldwide.]]></description>
